newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Morocco rejects bids for 355 mln dirhams t-bills.
newsitem.headline: Morocco rejects bids for 355 mln dirhams t-bills.

text.p: The Treasury rejected offers totalling 355 million dirhams at its weekly treasury bill auction, Bank al-Maghrib (central bank) said on Thursday.
Moroccan banks offered a total 355 million dirhams at interest rates ranging from 8.0 percent to 10 percent on periods running from 52 weeks to 15 years, a bank spokeswoman said.
This is the second week running that the Treasury has rejected offers. It had previously refused bids for three weeks starting from June 5.
